response.overview: A portrait of two men with Asperger Syndrome, who give us insights into their inner world throughself-written poetry and stories, thus relativizing both the concept of normality and any autism stereotypes.  What does your inner world look like? What rooms do you flee to when the outside world is unbearable? How does this world smell? Does it smell like traces of human scent? How do you connect your inner world with the outer world? A documentary not only about those who ask themselves these questions every day. A film not only about autism spectrum disorder or Asperger's syndrome but about all of us.
response.title: In the Glass House
